Translations.Text: £uo Tamud, gmat sen Ualie. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen s$uo Mass nnwen. Tal$wemt agi n Oebbi, d assekni i kunwi. Ooet ep a ppecc di tmurt n Oebbi. Ur p iiuoout, mulac a kwen ieaz uaaqeb aqeoean
Mmektit ed mi kwen Irra d igensas, deffir Aad. Isseqaad ikwen di tmurt, tepparram lebouj di swaeel, teqqazem ixxamen deg durar. Ihi, mmektit ed lxio n Oebbi, ur ssexsaoet tamurt, s usefsed
Imvebboen seg ugdud is, wid isme$awoen iman nnsen, nnan i wuohifen, wid segsen iumnen: "day teeoam ar UuUalie d amazan s$uo Mass is"? Nnan: "ih, numen s wayen is id ippuceggaa
Nnan imzuxiyen: "nekwni, s tidep, nenkeo ayen is tumnem
Eerrfen avao n tel$wemt, gelzen lameo n Mass nnsen. Nnan: "a Ualie, awi ya$ d ayen is la $ tessagwadev, ma d amazan ay telliv
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Iwexxeo asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d taboap n Mass iw, neuee$ kwen, maca ur teemmlem ara win ineueen
I Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "day a txeddmem laao ur ixdim yiwen, uqbel nnwen, deg imavalen
Ih, kunwi tpeddum ar irgazen, tcehwam ten, war tilawin. Kunwi, ih, d agdud izegren tilas
Tiririt n ugdud is siwa nnan: "ssuff$et pen si temdint nnwen, nitni d imdanen issaramen tezdeg
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is, teqqim akked wid igwran
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur…Wali amek tevoa d ibe$wviyen
